Posts.Content: Jul 13, 2013 11:12AM sadie1015 wrote: Got results yesterday.  It is cancer.  Having masectomy on the 22nd.  Too large for anything else.
Posts.Title: Hello Everyone Waiting, Waiting and Waiting sadie1015 patsback

Posts.Content: sadie1015 wrote: Hello Everyone, My name is Sarah and I am new here.  I had a biopsy on monday.  Friday I had a mamo and ultrasound.  The ultrasound revealed I have a 7-8cm "mass" that isn't fluid filled. Monday when I had my biopsy, the dr said he didn't want to wait and that the skin of my breast was thickened as well.  I am only 35 and have two small children and scared s***less.  The waiting is killing me.  I don't know what else this mass could be in my breast.  It literally popped up out of no where.  I woke up one morning and my breast was swollen twice the size of the other.  When the dr did the biopsy the other day, my mass was so hard that it literally broke the needle.  Has this happened to anyone else?  The dr said it had never happened before.  He wasn't one to give any information just other than it was very odd and he "didn't want to wait"  I did look several times when he did my biopsy and he showed me what "normal" tissue looks like but didn't say that when he actualy biopsied the mass.  He did say if it is negative, that he wants to do surgery to get a better sample because of the size and how it looked on radiology pictures.  Just want to know.  The suspense and waiting is killing me.  I am ready for whatever needs to happen.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Hello Everyone Waiting, Waiting and Waiting sadie1015 patsback

Posts.Content: Jul 11, 2013 03:49AM sadie1015 wrote: Janet, Thanks for the reply.  I have a feeling he will want this out too.  Just because of the size.  How strange that the result was initally benign. I hope you are o.k. now.  Sarah
